levels.description: The first bit is 1 if it is a weekday, and the second bit is 1 if we are on vacation. We sleep in if it is not a weekday or we're on vacation. Return :) if we sleep in, :( otherwise. [0 0] -> [: )]

We have two monkeys, each represented by 1 bit. A monkey's bit will be 1 if it is smiling. We are in trouble if they are both smiling or if neither of them is smiling. Return :) if we are in trouble, :( otherwise. [0 0] -> [: )]
The provided tape will contain a random number of 1s and 0s. Invert the tape so that all 1s become 0s, and all 0s become 1s. [0 1 1 0] -> [1 0 0 1]

The provided tape will contain two numbers that will have between 1 and 3 digits each. The numbers will be separated by enough spaces that there should always be at least 1 space between them during calculation. Add the two numbers together and return the sum right-aligned. [5 % % 6] -> [% % 1 1]
